Title: Coronavirus linked to cardiac injury even in patients without heart conditions - Oneindia
Description: COVID-19 can cause cardiac injury even in patients without underlying heart conditions, and have fatal consequences for people with cardiovascular disease, according to a review of studies.

Title: NIV Pune Scientists Release India's First Microscopy Image of Novel Coronavirus - The Weather Channel
Description: The picture marks the first imaging exercise from India using a transmission electron microscope (TEM).

Title: As coronavirus makes goodbyes hard, fears of many more rise in US - India Today
Description: The coronavirus outbreak could kill 100,000 to 200,000 Americans, the US government's top infectious-disease expert warned on Sunday as family members described wrenching farewells through hospital windows with dying loved ones.
